Class LegendAxis

public class LegendAxis
extends ValueAxis

An implementation of ValueAxis to render a chart Legend

drawAxis

public void drawAxis(XYPlot plot,
                     Layer layer,
                     Bounds axisBounds,
                     boolean gridOnly)
Description copied from class: ValueAxis
Draws the axis into the given layer, within the specified axisBounds, as well as drawing grid-lines on the given DefaultXYPlot.

Specified by:
drawAxis in class ValueAxis
Parameters:
plot - the plot to draw the gridlines into
layer - the layer to render the axis on
axisBounds - the bounds within the layer into which the axis should be drawn
gridOnly - if true, only render gridlines into the plots, render nothing else
